structuredData.name: Layanan CAVOTA
structuredData.description: Layanan pertumbuhan terpadu untuk brand modern—dari strategi hingga skalasi.

sections.heading: Layanan untuk Hasil Nyata
sections.subheading: Dari strategi hingga eksekusi—kami membangun sistem pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan untuk brand modern.

items.title: Ads Performance
items.subtitle: Performa Iklan
items.description: Pertumbuhan berbasis data di seluruh channel: Google, Meta, TikTok, Programmatic. Guardrails harian, creative rotation, dan kontrol biaya untuk ROAS konsisten.

items.title: Website Experience
items.subtitle: Pengalaman Web
items.description: Website super cepat, SEO-ready, dan terukur. Fokus pada UX, kecepatan, dan arsitektur data agar conversion naik.

items.title: Influencer & KOL
items.subtitle: Kerjasama Kreator
items.description: Aktivasi creator end-to-end—dari pemilihan, kontrak, hingga atribut ROI. Skala tanpa mengorbankan brand-fit.

items.title: SEO & Content
items.subtitle: Konten & Optimasi
items.description: Strategi konten terintegrasi: SEO teknis, content marketing, dan link building. Tampil di halaman 1 dengan traffic yang relevan.

items.title: Apps & Product
items.subtitle: Aplikasi & Produk
items.description: Pengembangan aplikasi ringan, cepat, dan terukur. Integrasi analitik & eksperimen untuk siklus rilis yang gesit.

items.title: Automation & Bots
items.subtitle: Otomasi & Bot
items.description: Otomatiskan alur kerja marketing, CRM, dan service dengan bot yang aman & terukur (WA/Telegram/Web).

items.title: Mentorship & Enablement
items.subtitle: Pendampingan Tim
items.description: Pendampingan tim in-house: playbook, QA mingguan, dan sistem review agar performa stabil jangka panjang.

sections.note: Dipercaya brand nasional & regional — Ratusan eksperimen, satu standar: hasil yang dapat diulang.

steps.title: Audit & Prioritas
steps.description: Peta peluang berdasar data, bukan opini.

steps.title: Eksekusi & Eksperimen
steps.description: Sprint mingguan, eksperimen terarah, dokumentasi rapi.

structuredData.name: CAVOTA Services
structuredData.description: End-to-end solutions for modern brands—strategy to scale.

sections.subheading: From strategy to execution—we ship sustainable growth systems for modern brands.

items.title: Performance Ads
items.subtitle: Paid Advertising
items.description: Data-driven growth across Google, Meta, TikTok, and Programmatic. Daily guardrails, creative rotation, and cost control for stable ROAS.

items.title: Website Experience

items.title: Influencer & KOL
items.subtitle: Creator Partnership
items.description: End-to-end creator activation—selection, contracting, and ROI attribution. Scale without losing brand-fit.

items.title: SEO & Content

items.description: Organic acquisition engine: technical SEO, impactful content, and clean internal linking for compound growth.

items.title: Apps & Product
items.subtitle: Application Development
items.description: Lightweight, fast, and scalable apps. Analytics-integrated with a tight experimentation loop.

items.title: Automation & Bots

items.description: Automate marketing, CRM, and service workflows with secure, scalable bots (WA/Telegram/Web).

items.title: Mentorship & Enablement

items.description: In-house team enablement: playbooks, weekly QA, and review systems for durable performance.

sections.note: Trusted by national & regional brands — Hundreds of experiments, one standard: repeatable outcomes.
